credit_line: Williams College Museum of Art, Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Gift of Mrs. Charles Prendergast
title: The Venetian Painters of the Renaissance
inscriptions: Pencil notations on color by CP on front and back dust jacket. Dust jacket for bookseller in Cannes - possibly bought in 1927 or 29. Inscription "1 00 met"  inside back cover.
